title: Modded Android Games Pack [8.12.2015]
description:
One (1) or Two (2) of the mods require you to disable signature verification using Lucky Patcher; or they simply won't work.

For installing the OBB move the extracted folder to SDCard/Android/OBB

One of the games supports four (4) different GPU's: PowerVR; Adreno; Mali; and Tegra.

You'll have to choose your GPU; just do a google search for your device.

The obb's are in zip archives and when the obb is too big it brakes it down to parts e.g. 001, 002, 003, and 004. I recommend extracting the .zip before the parts.

This pack include over thirty-six (36) modded android games without counting one (1) of the non-modded games and the multiple mod versions for one game
